channel.title: 时间 · 空间 · 相间 - Coding

item.title: JSON/BSON Serialization in Golang
item.description:
I am building a messaging system. The code for this messaging system is located at a Bitbucket repository. The provided instructions allow this messaging system to be run standalone in a self-hosted Kubernetes cluster.

The messaging system provides a REST API in JSON and saves/loads messages in MongoDB using …
item.dc:creator: Yong Yong Cheng
